https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/yt97UhIRU1G76lHZBdZE8S0WWjZ.jpg Throughout the three years of high school, Midori ate the bento lunch her dad made for her every single day. And in the very last bento of high school, Midori finds a photo of "the first high school bento" along with a hand written letter from her Dad. Dad's Lunch Box
